name: Amnesi-K Lemon
description: Amnesi-K Lemon by Kannabia Seed Company is an aromatic sativa created from three wonderful strains. This three-way cross of Amnesia x Lemon Skunk x Jack Herer emits a fresh, zesty aroma of grapefruit and deep autumnal fragrances of split wood and incense. Amnesi-K Lemon imbues the consumer with a happy, stimulating buzz that lends itself to creativity and whimsy. These uplifting effects naturally subdue stress, depression, and fatigue, making it a complementary companion for busy, active cannabis consumers.
descriptionPlain: Amnesi-K Lemon by Kannabia Seed Company is an aromatic sativa created from three wonderful strains. This three-way cross of Amnesia x Lemon Skunk x Jack Herer emits a fresh, zesty aroma of grapefruit and deep autumnal fragrances of split wood and incense. Amnesi-K Lemon imbues the consumer with a happy, stimulating buzz that lends itself to creativity and whimsy. These uplifting effects naturally subdue stress, depression, and fatigue, making it a complementary companion for busy, active cannabis consumers.

highlightedReviews.text:
Amnesi-K is a sativa hybrid with a very special smell (sweet and "sour") and a sweet pink flavor with acidic flavors. With great power of growth and flowering.

The brain effect is clean, with creative thoughts and leaving a good physical sensation (no stone efect).

Outdoors it is easy to grow giving large buds full of trichomes. Amnesi-K is a cannabis strain that must be cultivated once in a lifetime.
Clean high.  Low anxiety. No signs of a downer.
